p: Brentuximab vedotin (SGN-35) is a new antibody-drug conjugate (ADC) that binds to a cell surface marker, CD30, manufactured by Seattle Genetics, Inc. (SG, Inc.). CD30 is a type 1 membrane-penetrating protein, belonging to the tumor necrosis factor receptor super family. It appears on the Reed-Sternberg cells of HL patients and T cells of those with ALCL or other T-cell-mediated lymphoproliferative diseases.
